author: roberto.bayardo
content: From today's ACDE call there seemed to be agreement to adopt EIP-6493 (ssz transaction signature scheme) for blob tx signing, along with EIP-6475 (a different optional ssz encoding for To: field of the blob tx), though the latter would be updated a bit first to be more compatible with union types. CC: <@881905303011086387> to confirm.

author: etan_status
content:
Yes, EIP-6475 will be updated to take account of <@555483069038198827> 's feedback that the `Some` case should have a leading `0x01` byte. `None` will remain as empty, and union will be updated to also encode the `None` case as empty instead of `0x00`.

Besides that, EIP-6475 and EIP-6493 should be reviewed by relevant parties and will be discussed during EIP-4844 call on Monday 1 May 2023 (I probably won't make it myself). Reviews through ethmagicians and other channels are also welcome.

EIP-4844 would then be updated to use EIP-6475 (for the optional `to` field, and API return values) and EIP-6493 (with the 6493 txid going into the `transactions` MPT instead of the keccak going in there)
